title: Software Developer
description: This position is responsible for development of web, server, desktop app and iOS app. Based on requirements of scalability and reusability, I use NodeJS, MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS and Bootstrap to develop web and rest API service as MEAN structure in Linux, use python and relevant packages (numpy, scipy, and pyqt) for desktop app, and Objective-c for iOS app.

title: Intern
description: This position in ACT department assists colleagues in maintaining data accuracy. Because of Excel is the major tool in ACT, Excel VBA is preferred for checking data. I develop a dynamic website using JavaScript for meeting colleagues' needs of searching files, and use R to help other colleagues to clean research data.

title: Intranet Manager
description: In this position, my major job is routine server and internet management. The website is developed on ASP.NET, so I maintain MS Server 2008 and IIS.
